short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter for friends' activity in Steam. Allows to load activity for selected days and display needed part of it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now you don't have to scroll each day through whole Steam friends' activity looking for a particular event - filter activity for any day for any player or group and display only what you're interested in.
